extendedInfo.description: Studying to become a Special Education teacher? Getting ready to take your Praxis?Upward Mobility can help! With 350 questions, our app will prepare you for the Praxis II: Special Education Core Knowledge and Mild to Moderate applications.Study anywhere, anytime with our full-featured app: â¢ 350 questions, written by Special Education experts in the style found on the Praxis exam â¢ Explanatory answers, to expand and reinforce your knowledge â¢ Covers all exam topics:   > Development and Characteristics of Learners   > Planning the learning environment   > Instruction   > Assessment   > Foundation and Professional Responsibilities â¢ Study Mode - review questions and answers at your own pace â¢ Test Mode - Test your knowledge under timed exam-like conditions, and then review your results at the end â¢ Full off-line access â¢ Exclusive intuitive interfaceUpward Mobility is not affiliated with nor is this app endorsed by ETS, of which Praxis is a registered trademarkABOUT UPWARD MOBILITY: Upward Mobility is an independent test-preparation apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by writers who are subject matter experts and undergoes a thorough review process. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.
